testcase.name: Login in Adactin
testcase.system-out: Given user in AdactinHotel page.............................................passed When user login with valid "Priya3110" and"Priya@3110" and user navigate to searchHOtel page.passed And user choosing "Sydney","Hotel creek","standard"."one", "15/04/21" ,"16/04/21","one","one".passed And user click search button and user go to select hotel page...............passed And user choose a hotel in the list and click continue button and user should be in payment page.passed And user enter "poorni" ,"shuruthi" and "abc street chennai" "1234567890123456", "american express","jun" ,"2021" and "521".passed And user click book now button and user get the booked room details.........passed Then user click search hotel then moved to home page of search hotel........passed
